products.name: Site subscription
products.description: Buy this to get access to all the basic content on the site.

prices.description: Pay for site access monthly for flexibility!
prices.form:
<button class="btn btn-primary checkout-button_1">Checkout</button>

<script type="text/javascript">
    // Create an instance of the Stripe object with your publishable API key
    var checkoutButtons = document.getElementsByClassName('checkout-button_1');

    for (var i = 0; i < checkoutButtons.length; i++) {
        checkoutButtons[i].addEventListener('click', function () {
            // Create a new Checkout Session using the server-side endpoint you
            // created in step 3.
            fetch('http://oslmoodle.local.test/local/commerce/provider/stripecheckout/handlers/sessioncreator.php?sesskey=vXzXn5AqJx&priceid=1', {
                method: 'POST',
            })
                    .then(function (response) {
                        return response.json();
                    })
                    .then(function (session) {
                        var stripe = Stripe('pk_test_nZFKYYfn6RspWO9ZvOaqwltk');
                        return stripe.redirectToCheckout({sessionId: session.id});
                    })
                    .then(function (result) {
                        // If `redirectToCheckout` fails due to a browser or network
                        // error, you should display the localized error message to your
                        // customer using `error.message`.
                        if (result.error) {
                            alert(result.error.message);
                        }
                    })
                    .catch(function (error) {
                        console.error('Error:', error);
                    });
        });
    }
</script>

products.name: Course enrolment
